head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENBERG, AUDREY BICKART

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GREENBERG, AUDREY BICKART

block.p: GREENBERG - Audrey Bickart (nee Rosenberg). Born Sept. 30, 1906, New Orleans, LA. Survived by Deonne Bickart Finkelstein and husband, Howard; grandchildren, Myron, Christine, Matthew Finkelstein, Susan Westphal; great grandchildren, Kelsey & Zachary. Contributions to Bayard Cutting Arboretum, Oakdale, New York.

GREENBERG - Audrey Bickart (nee Rosenberg). Born Sept. 30, 1906, New Orleans, LA. Survived by Deonne Bickart Finkelstein and husband, Howard; grandchildren, Myron, Christine, Matthew Finkelstein, Susan Westphal; great grandchildren, Kelsey & Zachary. Contributions to Bayard Cutting Arboretum, Oakdale, New York.
